{"id":1199119989,"question_id":3351,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1710040202,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"34 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1199119989/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximize Happiness of Selected Children","memory":"61.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long maximumHappinessSum(int[] happiness, int k) {\n        Arrays.sort(happiness);\n        long ans = 0;\n        int n = happiness.length;\n        for(int i=0;i<k;i++){\n            ans+=((happiness[n-1-i]-i)>0?happiness[n-1-i]-i:0);    \n        }\n        \n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximize-happiness-of-selected-children","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
